sentences.english: Summary adjustment may be applied in simple cases.
sentences.chinese: 对于案情简单的案件，可以作简易理算。

sentences.english: Skinner's case will head back to lower courts for argument on the merits.
sentences.chinese: 斯金纳的情况下将头回对下级法院的案情说法。

sentences.english: I suggest you refer to relevant authorities for the specifics of the case.
sentences.chinese: 关于具体案情，希望你向有关部门了解。

sentences.english: This change in the underlying facts may affect the legal issues presented.
sentences.chinese: 案情发生的上述变化可能影响到本案提出的法律争点。

sentences.english: How will talent Yuan manage break solution details of a case again, find out really fierce.
sentences.chinese: 天才袁理又将如何破解案情，找出真凶。

sentences.english: The case is now being investigated as filing a false report, a misdemeanor.
sentences.chinese: 警方现已将此案定性为谎报案情的轻罪行为。

sentences.english: The case is now absolutely clear.
sentences.chinese: 现在案情已经清清楚楚了。

sentences.english: The case represents a new development in the law of libel.
sentences.chinese: 案情代表了反诽谤法的新动向。

sentences.english: Each crime category is considered separately and weighted based on its seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 对每类犯罪都分别并根据案情的严重性进行评估。

sentences.english: First chapter, case and legal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，案情及法律分析。

sentences.english: Hanna realized that what she was saying wasn`t doing her case any good.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜意识到她所说的话对她的案情没有任何好处。

sentences.english: Cao Zhengsun four discuss the case, Cao Zheng speculation Duan Weiping killed two people.
sentences.chinese: 曹政孙四康讨论案情，曹政臆测段伟平杀了两个人。

sentences.english: They employed the best lawyer they could get to plead their case.
sentences.chinese: 他们聘请了能请到的最好的律师为他们陈述案情。

sentences.english: Then himself knows details of a case to yuan of big company, deploy crack a criminal case.
sentences.chinese: 于是他亲自到大元公司了解案情，部署破案。

sentences.english: His case is strong, I can win it.
sentences.chinese: 他的案情很有利，我能给他打赢。

sentences.english: The degree of risk needs to be assessed on a case-by-case basis.
sentences.chinese: 对风险程度必须按各案情逐个加以评估。
